Author: blackjok3r#3181
Content:
Ok well we have 3 problems. Migrate script needs updating to work with RPC changes. Seems this si easy to fix, so I will do this first. 
2) iguana is having bad sig problems -25/26 errors, seems only on LABS so points to a deamon isssue rather than iguana itself/
3) the tokens need a size limit to prevent an import tx that cannot be spent being made.

Author: blackjok3r#3181
Content: ALL of the -26/25 are on KMD. So I thbink this is related to @gt's issue

Author: blackjok3r#3181
Content: Do you have any mor information that can help me?

Author: blackjok3r#3181
Content: normally these errors come from a node trying to spend spent utxos

Author: gt#2812
Content: yes i believe that‚Äôs what likely happened

Author: blackjok3r#3181
Content: have you tried a -rescan on KMD

Author: gt#2812
Content: i‚Äôm doing a reindex atm

Author: blackjok3r#3181
Content: Seems like maybe a wallet corruption issue to m... but its clearly happening to someone else too

Author: blackjok3r#3181
Content: or morethan 1 person. I have a way to find who is doing it .. but I need to remeber how to use it, its been a very long time since these errors have been happening

Author: blackjok3r#3181
Content: ok I still ahve all my scripts so setting up a log of whos nodes are submitting spent sigs. At least we can find out who is doing it and direct them to try and fix it... still dont know what coud have caused this though :/

Author: blackjok3r#3181
Content: A way to detect and ban nodes doing this would be the optimal solution, but because of sapling this might be hard.

Content: there is only a few things it can be .. I added code that feteches `getiguanajson` at the start of every round for the minsigs and pubkeys

Author: blackjok3r#3181
Content: That is the 1 diffrence we have copared to mainnet

Author: blackjok3r#3181
Content: Maybe its not updating the pubkeys correctly... But I think rouldns would fail at an earlier stage if the keys were wrong

Author: blackjok3r#3181
Content:
All the errors are on KMD, and there were a LOT of them earlier ... All my script is doing is seeing a few seconds after the attmepted notarization which node has a spent utxo inside this transaction. Technically there shouldnt be any pent utxo, but there could be, if the wallet is corrupted, or the lock and unlock utxo isnt working correctly. 
Or nothing will show up spent, in which case the error is somehting else.

Author: CrisF#3405
Content: Is there anything we need to do for this, or is the logging all being done on your end?

Author: blackjok3r#3181
Content: my node logs it all

Author: blackjok3r#3181
Content: so glad i left this code laying around lol

Author: blackjok3r#3181
Content: allI had to do was manually make the node list and rebuild iguana with -DLOGTX and run the script, worked instantly üòÑ

Author: CrisF#3405
Content: Hi, I'd like to confirm that this has been decided regarding ```The chain name must begins with 'LABS' or 'LAB'?. eg. LABSXXXX```with ```LAB for Labs 'official' work chains (ie, LABMETA), and LABS for cluster, project chains```

Author: CrisF#3405
Content: meaning a Labs oracle chain might be `LABORKL` and an oracle chain made by a project would be `LABSORKL`
